messages.content: ComfyUI-Menu-Anchor is an extension for ComfyUI that moves the menu to the specified corner on startup.
ComfyUI-Menu-Anchor solves the problem of buttons being out of the screen on launch when multiple extensions are installed that add buttons to the ComfyUI menu.
How can you access the settings for ComfyUI-Menu-Anchor?
You can access the settings for ComfyUI-Menu-Anchor by clicking the cog icon.
What option allows you to select which corner to snap the menu to?
The 'Menu Anchor Mode' option in the settings allows you to select which corner to snap the menu to.
How can you make the ComfyUI menu always stick to the selected corner?
You can enable the 'Menu Anchor Always' option in the settings to make the ComfyUI menu always stick to the selected corner.
What action is required for the changes made in the settings to take effect?
A refresh (by pressing 'F5') is required for the changes made in the settings to take effect.
